Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers

Class CommonManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.managers.CommonManager
public class CommonManager extends Object
Class that contains all the methods that take the game objects using the playerId requested.

    • takeSchoolBoardByPlayerId

      public static SchoolBoard takeSchoolBoardByPlayerId(GameEngine gameEngine, int playerId) throws SchoolBoardNotSetException, NoSuchElementException
      Returns the school board of the player with playerId. Throws SchoolBoardNotSetException if the school board has not been set, NoSuchElementException if the required school board could not be found.
      Parameters:
      gameEngine - the game engine
      playerId - the identifier of the player
      Returns:
      the school board of the player with playerId
      Throws:
      SchoolBoardNotSetException - if the school board has not been set
      NoSuchElementException - if the required school board could not be found
      See Also:
      • GameEngine
      • Player
      • SchoolBoard

    • takeIslandTileById

      public static IslandTile takeIslandTileById(GameEngine gameEngine, int islandId) throws TableNotSetException, NoSuchElementException
      Returns the island tile with islandId. Throws TableNotSetException if the table has not been set, NoSuchElementException if the required island tile could not be found.
      Parameters:
      gameEngine - the game engine
      islandId - the id of the required island tile
      Returns:
      the required island tile
      Throws:
      TableNotSetException - if the table has not been set
      NoSuchElementException - if the required island tile could not be found

      playerId - the id of the required player

      the required team id

    • takeTeamIdByTowerColor

      public static int takeTeamIdByTowerColor(GameEngine gameEngine, TowerColor color) throws TowerNotSetException
      Returns the id of the Team that has tower color equal to color.
      Parameters:
      gameEngine - the game engine
      color - the color of the towers of the required team
      Returns:
      the required team id
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the required team could not be found
      TowerNotSetException - if any Tower had been added to the Team
